content: @Eric Haas would you happen to be aware of a tool that can generate a diagram that illustrates how resources are referenced to each other, with focus on profiled references - eg. a diagram that illustrates how the resources within a IG relates to each other?
@Jens we have a tool on Simplifier, but it's in beta, I can give you beta access, if you let me know on which account (email).
also can use ClinFHIR for quick visualizations
